---
title: "Grups creats"
date: "`r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y %H:%M')`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(DT)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
groups_clean %>%
  mutate(time = format(groups_clean$time)) %>%
  group_by(`Hora creació` = time, `ID grup` = id_group) %>%
  summarise(.groups = 'drop', `ID membres` = paste(sort(id), collapse=',')) %>%
  mutate(`Dades` = sprintf('<a  target=_blank href="https://moodle2.udg.edu/pluginfile.php/1890669/mod_folder/content/0/penguins_%s.xlsx">penguins_%s.xlsx</a>', `ID grup`, `ID grup`),
         `ID grup` = sprintf('<a  target=_blank href="https://moodle2.udg.edu/pluginfile.php/1681165/mod_folder/content/0/enunciat1_%s.pdf">%s</a>', `ID grup`, `ID grup`),
         ) %>%
  select(`Hora creació`, `ID grup`, `ID membres`,  `Dades`) %>%
  datatable(escape = FALSE, options = list(pageLength = -1, dom = 'ft'))
```
